text: Use %%code{/lunch} to tell your team members that you're at lunch break. Some examples:
• %%code{/lunch}: Start or end your lunch break (default: %s minutes, your setting: %s minute%s)
• %%code{/lunch 30}: Start your lunch break for 30 minutes
• %%code{/lunch default 30}: Set your default lunch break time to 30 minutes
• %%code{/lunch default unset}: Unset your default lunch break time
